text:
There is exec returned: 139 which is failing a jenkins build, even if build was successful: 

stacktrace:


BUILD FAILED

	at org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.ExecTask.runExecute(ExecTask.java:650)

	at org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.ExecTask.execute(ExecTask.java:502)

creator: karol.kujawiak@gmail.com

text: well, this is hard to tell without knowing what Ant was executing.  Whatever the process was it returned an exit code of 139.
creator: bodewig@apache.org

text:
This seems more like a question for the user list.
I will be closing this report.
The exec task by default does not fail on error, one has to set explicitly failonerror="true" to make the build fail.
I read that 139 is a SEGV (segmentation violation) status.
creator: antoine@apache.org
